Module io.jstach.rainbowgum
Package io.jstach.rainbowgum.spi

Interface RainbowGumServiceProvider.Configurator

All Superinterfaces:
RainbowGumServiceProvider
All Known Subinterfaces:
PatternConfig
All Known Implementing Classes:
AvajePropertiesProvider, GelfEncoderConfigurator, JAnsiConfigurator, JULConfigurator, LoggerDecoratorService, PatternConfigurator, PatternKeywordProvider, RabbitMQInitializer
Enclosing interface:
RainbowGumServiceProvider
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public static non-sealed interface RainbowGumServiceProvider.Configurator extends RainbowGumServiceProvider
Called after LogConfig has been loaded to do various custom initialization like registering LogOutput.OutputProviders.

The configurator has the option to return false to indicate a retry needs to be made. This is a simple way to handle dependency needs of one configurator needing another to run prior.

See Also:
  • LogConfig.outputRegistry()
  • ServiceRegistry

  • Method Details

    • configure

      boolean configure(LogConfig config, RainbowGumServiceProvider.Pass pass)
      Do ad-hoc initialization before RainbowGum is fully loaded.
      Parameters:
      config - config.
      pass - info on what pass this is.
      Returns:
      true if all dependencies were found.

    • runConfigurators

      static void runConfigurators(Stream<? extends RainbowGumServiceProvider.Configurator> configurators, LogConfig config)
      Runs configurators. If a configurator returns false then it will be retried. The default of 4 passes will be tried.
      Parameters:
      configurators - stream of configurators.
      config - config to use for registration.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if there are configurators still returning false.
